A useful liquid that is obtained in an [[oil refinery|Oil Refinery]] during the [[advanced oil processing|Advanced Oil Processing]]. It allows the production of [[bakelite|Bakelite]] when mixed with petroleum gas in the [[chemical plant|Chemical Plant]] and [[solvent|Solvent]] when mixed with all forms of [[naphtha|Naphtha]] in the [[industrial mixer|Industrial Mixer]]. It is also used in the production of Kevlar, a high-strength material for crafting armor, and [[TNT|TNT]].

Aromatic hydrocarbons are also obtained mainly by [[fractioning|Fractioning Tower]] of [[reformate|Reformate]], [[cracking|Catalytic Cracking Tower]] of [[bitumen|Bitumen]] and [[BTX|BTX]], and [[reforming|Reforming]] of [[light oil|Light Oil]].
